scripts.deploy:chapel: npm run build:chapel && graph deploy --product hosted-service ZoneCapital/zone-capital-subgraph
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run build:ropsten && graph deploy --product hosted-service ZoneCapital/zone-capital-ropsten
scripts.deploy:local: npm run build:local && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 ZoneCapital/zone-capital-subgraph
